mapper.insert: insert into account (account_id, account_name, account_password, account_description, account_sex, create_datetime, operator, operator_ip, operate_datetime, last_login_datetime) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{accountDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update account set account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_password = #{accountPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, account_description = #{accountDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_sex = #{accountSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_datetime = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_datetime = #{operateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_datetime = #{lastLoginDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select account_id, account_name, account_password, account_description, account_sex, create_datetime, operator, operator_ip, operate_datetime, last_login_datetime from account where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select account_id, account_name, account_password, account_description, account_sex, create_datetime, operator, operator_ip, operate_datetime, last_login_datetime from account where account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select account_id, account_name, account_description, account_sex, create_datetime, operator, operator_ip, operate_datetime, last_login_datetime from account where account_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR account_description like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') limit #{startRow,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{endRow,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select account_id, account_name, account_password, account_description, account_sex, create_datetime, operator, operator_ip, operate_datetime, last_login_datetime from account
